duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs repairs and modifications on aircraft seats and components.
Maintains status logs on all items requiring repair.
Orders, receives, and stocks parts from Germany.
Completes all related documentation required by the Company, the FAA, and the customer.
Conducts training for customer maintenance personnel on the various aspects of aircraft seats.
Travels to repair seats at customer and supplier locations.
Provides input to Engineering concerning seat component design issues, proposals, and revisions.
